comments.raw_text:
To reproduce it:

1. Click-and-hold on installed app in Dashboard
2. Uninstall app
3. Look inside ~/Applications - the ".app" folder is still there
comments.text:
To reproduce it:

1. Click-and-hold on installed app in Dashboard
2. Uninstall app
3. Look inside ~/Applications - the ".app" folder is still there

comments.text:
(In reply to Matthew Riley MacPherson [:tofumatt] from comment #3)
> What's going on with the Pivotal Tracker link? It just shows a weird "sign
> out" message that looks like JSON to me.

I'd ignore that - that was a mistake on my part a while back when I was testing pivotal tracker integration into bugzilla.
